title: Use only the wearable part of play-services, otherwise I was getting extra…
message:
Use only the wearable part of play-services, otherwise I was getting extra permissions added to my final APK

    uses-permission: name='android.permission.INTERNET'
    uses-permission: name='android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE'
    uses-permission: name='android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE'
    uses-permission: name='android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION'
    uses-permission: name='android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE' maxSdkVersion='18'
    uses-permission: name='android.permission.GET_ACCOUNTS'
    uses-permission: name='android.permission.USE_CREDENTIALS'
